= 5.3 - 2019-03-11
*Updates: Consolidated CSS for faster performance.

= 5.1 - 2019-03-05
*Updates: Added version numbers to CSS.  Fixed some responsive issues. Fixed Book Now feature padding.

= 5.0 - 2019-02-28
*Updates: Added "book now" feature. You can add a Buy or Book Now button to any style.

= 4.8.7 - 2019-01-12=
*Updates: Fixed style #1 - #5 styling. Added chat support. Changes related to default font for style 1 and style 5
Default font size functionality for style 2, style 3 and style 4. Changes related to h3 tag, style 5 design correction and style 3 font Issue.


= 4.8.4 - 2019-01-12=
*Updates: Fixed style #5 styling

= 4.8.2 - 2019-01-03=
*Updates: Added mockup images

= 4.8.1 - 2018-12-11=
*Updates: Added target blank to links

= 4.8 - 2018-12-04=
*Updates: Fixed Style 3 again.

= 4.7 - 2018-11-30=
*Updates: In SPL, video popup issue on pageload, styles image issue & category tabs font color issue fixed.
License key error issue & site-origin plugin warning issue fixed.
Style 3, masonary issue fixed.
Fixed the issue of price tag width & seperator line thickness in Style 5.

= 4.6 - 2018-11-22=
*Updates: Fixed left alignment issue.

= 4.5 - 2018-11-20=
*Updates: Updated plugin to be compatible with the latest WordPress version (5.0) that wil be releasing soon.

= 4.2.3 - 2018-11-06=
*Fixes: Fixed various PHP issues and turned off video autoplay

= 4.2.2 - 2018-10-12 = 
* Updates: Fixed Style #5 issues

= 4.2.1 - 2018-10-10 = 
* Updates: Updated footer and contact buttons

= 4.2.0 - 2018-09-27 = 
* Updates: Added Style $5. Our favourite one so far!

= 4.1.9 - 2018-09-20 = 
* Fixes: Some minor bugs

= 4.1.8 - 2018-09-19 = 
* Fixes: Some minor bugs

* Updated: Fixed styling issue for bullet points on style 4.

* Updated: Made some major backend changes for a better admin user experience. Fixed some bugs.

= 4.1.2 - 2018-08-23 = 

* Updated: Small sytling changes. Character fixes for Europe.



= 4.1.1 - 2018-08-09 = 

* Updated: Fixing white screen bug.



= 4.1.0 - 2018-08-03 = 

* Updated: Added category descriptions to style #2, #3. Re-designed the style #4 to be two columns. Fixed some medium

sized bugs.



= 4.0.3 - 2018-07-26 = 

* Updated: Fixed some minor bugs. Added support for certain language characters. Added warning messge for using small fonts.



= 4.0.2 - 2017-07-24 = 

* Updated: Last update was missing files. My apologies.



= 4.0.1 - 2017-07-23 = 

* Updated: Fixed a bug with the save button. Added a fourth style. Added an option to change the display of style #3 on desktops and laptops to 

either cause a line break (fluid) for the placement of the categories.
